sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import Navbar from '../components/Navbar' import Sidebar from '../components/Sidebar' class Language extends React.Component{ state = { //User user_id: null, firstname: null, lastname: null, user_role: null, //Language language_name: null, language_description: null, language_family: null, language_subfamily: null, language_description: null, language_wiki: null, language_speakers: null, language_writingsys: null, } componentDidMount(){ //Get User ID from Local Storage this.setState({user_id: localStorage.getItem('user_id')}) //User Info with Axios.get axios.get(`http://localhost:4000/users/${localStorage.getItem('user_id')}`) .then(response => this.setState({ firstname: response.data[0].firstname, lastname: response.data[0].lastname, user_role: response.data[0].user_role, user_id: response.data[0].user_id } )) .catch(error => console.log(error)) //Course Info with Axios.get axios.get(`http://localhost:4000/languages/${this.props.match.params.id}`) .then(response => this.setState({ language_name: response.data[0].language, language_description: response.data[0].language, language_family: response.data[0].language, language_subfamily: response.data[0].language, language_description: response.data[0].language, language_wiki: response.data[0].language, language_speakers: response.data[0].language, language_writingsys: response.data[0].language, } )) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } render(){ return (
COURSES
NEW COURSE

Course Creator

Language
Male
Female
Select a task type
Option 1
Option 2
) } } export default Language;
